cause.description:
Dachshunds are one of the most popular and wonderful dogs. Unfortunately, as is the case with many popular animals these dogs are over-bred, and in many cases, are not taken care of properly. There are so many of these dogs and their protectors that need your help with medical bills and finding a forever home. All money donated goes directly to Dachshund Rescue of North America. An organization that I can guarantee is making a difference.
1. Dachshunds are wonderful animals who need our protection.
2. All of these animals deserve the ability to live a fulfilling life.
3. Dachshunds, through overbreeding (and other factors), are especially prone to genetically based health problems, thus they are especially in need of financial support for medical bills.
cause.mission: We are committed to finding abused, neglected, and abandoned dachshunds a forever home.
cause.name: Dachshund Rescue
